name: Burger Lord
description:
a love letter to "BurgerTime", intellivision, 1983

Battle top chefs and evil snacks, tame the falling castles,
craft the finest ever made burgers and prove you can became
a True Burger Lord

Burger Lord is an intense action game with an unique challenging game play.
Avoid the water and toss your enemies overboard for top score.
Stand by a fine burger through the round´s showdown.
Beat the random 9 rounds campaign.
Achieve the highest score!

Features:
. powerful intro tune by Yubatake
. 5 fantastic in-game tunes by Wyver9
. physics, jumps, gravity, castle collapse
. up to 3 players, coop and pvp
. 2 difficult modes
. campaign generator
. 64 handcrafted castles
. 5 unique evil snacks

Instructions
On main menu:
Esc - return to main menu / Quit
M - music on/off
Space - change game mode A / B
Any action button will add a player to the game,
do it twice to start.

In game:
Arrows / pad / analog - control player
Z or button 1 - jump
X or button 2 - throw pepper
